title: Mohan Samaranayake appointed new Media Spokesman to the President
content: Mohan Samaranayake was appointed as the new Media Spokesman to the President in addition to his post as the Chairman of the Sri Lanka Rupavahini Corporation, the President’s Media Division (PMD) stated. Ms. Anuradha Herath was appointed as the Director of International Media, the PMD stated. Bandula Jayasekera, who earlier held the position, is to…
